Quote.Author: Campbell Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: TV news has largely given Trump editorial control

Quote.Author: Campbell Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: As the ratings go up, so does advertising revenue

Quote.Author: Campbell Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Any time you challenge a big powerful person or special interest, there's going to be blowback

Quote.Author: Campbell Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: It's better to be honest about your opinions than to pretend you don't have them

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Working hard is great, being lazy sometimes is great, but failed potential is the worst

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I just wanna get to the end of the day without it raining

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody loves a villain - let's face it

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I make little movies, you know, they need all the help that they can get

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a big one for lots of genitals flapping in the films

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people tend to live, whether they like it or not, influenced by what's next door to them

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: The fact is, it's hard to release movies

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I worked with Lukas Haas a long time ago, when he was younger, and he was wonderful

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I love that I'm rarely recognized. I like it because I know I can look different from film to film

Quote.Author: Campbell Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: Details are the only thing that separates one movie from another

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: Women with money and women in power are two uncomfortable ideas in our society

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: There's so many things that mattered so much in my 20s and 30s that don't matter now

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Lipstick Jungle' was on the air for 20 episodes - I loved 'Lipstick Jungle.'

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: You need characters who want things. They want love, they want recognition, they want happiness

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm looking forward to writing more novels for young adults

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a house in the Connecticut countryside where you'll always find me, summer or winter

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I love things that are old and glittery, that come with layers of glamour and past lives

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought that there was a really good chance that I wasn't going to get married

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really enjoying being single. I'm not even looking to meet anybody, which is so freeing

Quote.Author: Candace Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a young woman's relationship with her father is really important

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: The perfect antidote to dark, cold and creepy is light, warm and cozy

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: Why have one chandelier when you can have two?

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: With every bathroom renovation, there are three areas that I focus on: budget, function and style

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: I tell people marriage is a compromise, and so are renovations

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: Dining rooms are really all about the table and the chairs

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: In tight quarters, it's important to choose small-scale items

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: The type of renovation I do most often is opening a kitchen to the family room

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: Great French design is often about unexpected touches

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: Clients usually come to me when they want to update the look of an existing room

Quote.Author: Candice Olson
Quote.QuoteValue: I sort of went into the TV thing kicking and screaming

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love what I do. I'm not worried about any burnout

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: There are great legends and great fighters in the history of Mexico, and there will be more to come

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: I train to fight, to win

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't fear anyone. We don't come to play in this sport

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: You can have the best training, but just feeling full can make you sluggish and cause you to lose

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: I look like this for a reason. I was born this way. It was God-given

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: When I first stepped into the boxing gym, I loved it. I knew it was what I was going to do

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very happy with what I've accomplished, but we're going for more

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: My job is to train hard, go fight, and do my best

Quote.Author: Canelo Alvarez
Quote.QuoteValue: For the entirety of my career, I have taken the fights that no one wanted because I fear no man

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: My escape is to just get in a boat and disappear on the water

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: One problem with age is that patience begins to ebb

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no writer's block in a newsroom. There's only unemployment block

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest sin for a writer is to be boring

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never progressed very far from my days as a smart aleck in middle school

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: My books are character-driven. They're not driven by the story

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to get distracted by the vaudevillian aspects of the healthcare debate

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: Humor can be an incredible, lacerating and effective weapon

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: The one word that no politician will ever speak, is 'enough.' Enough

Quote.Author: Carl Hiaasen
Quote.QuoteValue: I won't be making any friends in the corporate suites

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite thing is to have a big dinner with friends and talk about life

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: I love doing serious movies for adults

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a huge Wong Kar-Wai fan

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I'm the only person - or woman, at least - who hasn't read 'Fifty Shades of Grey.'

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a sensualist. My two main indulgences are dark chocolate and massages

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: My father and my mother separated when I was two

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: I kind of knew it wasn't going to be until my 30s that I really hit my stride as an actor

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always take an artistic endeavor over a career move

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: Sexuality is one of the biggest parts of who we are

Quote.Author: Carla Gugino
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm always trying to subvert conventions, and sometimes it's more successful than others

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I've kept to myself, I've put my head down. I've gone to work. And I have felt undervalued

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: Playing in Wembley Stadium in front of 83-some-thousand fans to win a gold medal was unreal

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't run on the treadmill, because there's no treadmill moving for you on the soccer field

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I went from a player who was never fit to a person who actually worked hard to get myself in shape

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're quiet, and you don't speak out, you're never going to get anything accomplished

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I've taken great pride in not being fragile

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I really hate drama. It's draining; it's mentally draining. It's a waste of time

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm loyal. I'm real. I'm not afraid to say what I'm thinking

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: As a player, you just want to focus on controlling the controllables

Quote.Author: Carli Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I love shopping! It's my release sometimes

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a literary animal. For me, everything ends in literature

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: What the United States does best is to understand itself. What it does worst is understand others

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: My system for staying young is to work a lot, to always have a project on the go

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States condoned dictatorships in Latin America for much of the 20th century

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfect order is the forerunner of perfect horror

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: I use a lot of film images, analogies, and imagination

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing requires the concentration of the writer, demands that nothing else be done except that

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: I must write the book out in my head now, before I sit down

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: I started my own magazine with drawings, commentary, news, film reviews and drawings

Quote.Author: Carlos Fuentes
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States is very good at understanding itself, and very bad at understanding others

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to mix and match vintage with designer. It's how I create my own style

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a little bit of a hippie at heart, so I always wear things that are comfortable and flowing

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I do think grand gestures are a hit and miss, especially for girls

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like guys who have confidence, but not the cocky over-the-top confidence

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have so many gay friends that I love

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I know my music is going well when I don't have insomnia

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: The airport paparazzi kind of wigs me out a little bit

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: My music is bejewelled, it's colourful, it's romantic, it shines

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: I waited for my first kiss

Quote.Author: Carly Rae Jepsen
Quote.QuoteValue: My tactic is to make eyes at someone

Quote.Author: Carmen Electra
Quote.QuoteValue: I want someone who can keep me on my toes, has a good sense of humor and a good heart

Quote.Author: Carmen Electra
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to go get fireworks, even though some of them are illegal

Quote.Author: Carmen Electra
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a constant sweet tooth, so I like anything from the bakery, like cupcakes, cookies

Quote.Author: Carmen Electra
Quote.QuoteValue: I love doing comedy - I get a laugh out of it, it's not so serious

Quote.Author: Carmen Electra
Quote.QuoteValue: I know I'm not perfect

Quote.Author: Carmen Electra
Quote.QuoteValue: For some reason if we hear 100 praises and one criticism, we focus on that one hurtful thing

Quote.Author: Carmen Electra
Quote.QuoteValue: I love kids. I just love kids. They put you in a good mood and they are so full of life

Quote.Author: Carmen Electra
Quote.QuoteValue: When anything bad happens, my insecurities come flooding out

Quote.Author: Carmen Electra
Quote.QuoteValue: People who know me know I have a sense of humor that can really push the envelope

Quote.Author: Carmen Electra
Quote.QuoteValue: I like everything loud, over the top, dramatic

Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: The evening is really hard for me. I have to force myself not to eat

Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have willpower and determination. I am very resilient, like rock

Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not just being overweight that's dangerous. Stress is dangerous

Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Becoming famous is a strange thing in your own right

Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Medication can help us live a happier life

Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Do I wish I could retire? Sure, but that's not life

Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a huge emotional component to weight loss

Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, moderation, not deprivation. That's my new way of living

Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Certain foods no longer agree with me. If I eat French fries, I might feel sick to my stomach

Quote.Author: Carnie Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know how to relax, that's my problem

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: I still read Donne, particularly his love poems

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: Poetry and prayer are very similar

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to think that I'm a sort of poet for our times

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted a child. Being a mother is the central thing in my life

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: If we think of what's up ahead, with climate change and wars over water, it's very frightening

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: Edinburgh is my favourite city. We'll be doing a lot of children's theatre and galleries

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: Between 9am and 3pm is when I work most intensely

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day is a gift with a child, no matter what problems you have

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: I write in that space between Ella's childhood and mine. I know it all sounds a bit sinister

Quote.Author: Carol Ann Duffy
Quote.QuoteValue: My prose is turgid, it just hasn't got any energy

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: The first couple of days on the detox diet aren't pleasant

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: My bottom is so big it's got its own gravitational field

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: For now I'm building up stories for the retirement home!

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything has to be organised for kids in London - you can't just walk three roads to see a friend

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: Change is one of my favourite words

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very pleased how my children have turned out

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people have the wrong idea about me because I've been very private

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: I drive a tiny Toyota iQ. I'm quite frugal and often cut my own hair

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never say never to marrying again but for the time being I'm having a great time

Quote.Author: Carol Vorderman
Quote.QuoteValue: After 30 years of television, I want to play more than I used to

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: When you make the right decision, it doesn't really matter what anyone else thinks

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: As much as we need a prosperous economy, we also need a prosperity of kindness and decency

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Change isn't easy, it takes time

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: In my family in particular, I think, there was a sense we have to work twice as hard

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I know how important it is to, you know, to be my own person

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy writing. I enjoy that kind of process

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that the presidency really brings out the best in a lot of people

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lifelong devotion to public service

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up in politics I know that women decide all elections because we do all the work

Quote.Author: Caroline Kennedy
Quote.QuoteValue: Poetry is really a way of sharing feelings and ideas

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: Someone told me that when they go to Vermont, they feel like they're home. I'm that way at Saks

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got big feet, so filling someone else's big shoes doesn't scare me

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: I am conversational - I just like to engage and talk about things

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I feel like somebody flipped a switch, and the whole world is in Technicolor now

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: I always like to think I'm having a dinner party, and I'm the host, and the audience are my guests

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't get any braver than going on national television to be weighed

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll be a host for life!

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up thinking that if I wanted to go be prime minister, I could

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: I was just the youngest in the family, and most in desperate need of attention

Quote.Author: Caroline Rhea
Quote.QuoteValue: As a kid, I always wanted to be Carol Burnett or Johnny Carson. I love to chat and entertain

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: It not unusual for women with anorexia to suffer heart attacks

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: I bicycle 12,000-foot mountain passes, run, cross train, skate-ski, hike and mountain bike

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a daughter, a sister, a wife and a mother. I am a friend of women and I am their advocate

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is full of change and uncertainty. We know this. We experience it on a daily basis

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: I had my first seizure, and I had to go in for heart surgery

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: Many women who have anorexia put their hearts in a compromised situation

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: My weight fluctuated when I was 30, and I did the unthinkable - I stepped out as a plus-sized model

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't know what to do with calories

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: When you become a parent, it's not all about you anymore

Quote.Author: Carre Otis
Quote.QuoteValue: I've found that balance is key. I'm no longer an extremist in any one direction

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: When I told my friends I was going to be a comedian, they laughed at me

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: Carrot Top is a nickname that people call me and I thought that it was more marketable

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: My way of fitting in was through jokes and making people laugh

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: It's weird, I never wish anything bad upon anybody, except two or three old girlfriends

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: I was the class clown at school, but at home, my family wasn't very funny

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: It's our nature: Human beings like success but they hate successful people

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: People always want to put a label on you; they always want to compare you to something

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: People do give me a hard time about my hair because it's orange and it's big

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a home in Orlando. That's kind of my default 'getaway' city

Quote.Author: Carrot Top
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be known just as 'Carrot Top.' I don't always want to be this crazy, goofy guy

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: We did a whole fraternity house. We made them over

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: Challenge yourself, jump off the deep end and learn to swim

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: I hoped I could make people smile and laugh and have a good time

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned how to dance. I got a free spray tan. My life is good!

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not much about rules, I like to break 'em and don't like to make 'em

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: I was into Barbie and designer jeans

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: Show's going well. New season starting, we're on the road

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: It's incredibly hard to program a network from scratch for 24 hours

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: I love fashion, but it's always been my job, whereas horseriding is my hobby

Quote.Author: Carson Kressley
Quote.QuoteValue: Compare yourself to yourself and say, 'How can I be better? How can I be the real me?'

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: The flow of Guiness into the studio was inspirational as well as nutritive

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I prefer a life in which we don't take ourselves too seriously

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't personally see my work as being dark. What interests me is a balance between light and dark

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Big Sur is at the end of the continent. It attracts really crazy people

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I write music to please myself. Hopefully the director's enjoying it too

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: There is not much irony when people are being happy on screen

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't find myself lobbying for projects. Filmmakers almost always come to me

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Death is always around the corner, but often our society gives it inordinate help

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: When the systems we expect to help us actually hurt us, we have tragedy

Quote.Author: Carter Burwell
Quote.QuoteValue: If not bliss, ignorance can at least be fun

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: To succeed with the opposite sex, tell her you're impotent. She can't wait to disprove it

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Do your job and demand your compensation - but in that order

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone wants to be Cary Grant. Even I want to be Cary Grant

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Ah, beware of snobbery; it is the unwelcome recognition of one's own past failings

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: When people tell you how young you look, they are telling you how old you are

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I pretended to be somebody I wanted to be until finally I became that person. Or he became me

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: Divorce is a game played by lawyers

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that making love is the best form of exercise

Quote.Author: Cary Grant
Quote.QuoteValue: My father used to say, 'Let them see you and not the suit. That should be secondary.'

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very bad relationship with mice

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm tired of playing the brat

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: In a movie we try to deceive. In theaters, as they say, the deceived are the wisest

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I have friends who remember seeing fish hauled onto a boat's deck and beaten to death

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: People should try eating no animal products for just ONE DAY a week

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I tricked myself into doing this movie

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: If I can't see the humor in it, how am I going to be funny?

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: You sleep with people all the time that you hate

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: Why can't people just say they were moved? Why do they have to say it's sappy?

Quote.Author: Casey Affleck
Quote.QuoteValue: I like studio movies; I love big commercial movies

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: I started singing when I was four years old; that was the first time I took a voice lesson

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: I love when people cover songs that are familiar but have been kind of forgotten about

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the best at expressing my feelings other than in songs or on paper

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: I love 'Ocean Avenue' by Yellowcard. That's always been one of my favorites

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: I am writing things on my own, but I really believe co-writing makes you a better writer

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: The first album I owned was probably a Backstreet Boys album, and shortly after was Shania Twain

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up in Florida was really amazing. I spent most my time at the beach

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned to really just trust my gut and to go with what I really feel inside

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not trying to claim I'm a country singer, but I do love country music

Quote.Author: Cassadee Pope
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to sell music, and I want radio to play my songs

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't shop because I need something, I just shop for shopping's sake

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate last-minute shopping, it's always unsuccessful

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm getting comfortable with West Coast style, which is more laid-back than British style

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't lie... My face always gives me away. I'm also pathetically bad at poker!

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll never stop appreciating how lucky I am

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I love people who are very honest and very open and don't pretend to be anything they're not

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't host a show and go, 'Have you got my best angle?'

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I find great lighting and a squint of the eyes makes anyone look better

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: Being famous hasn't changed my perception of myself - I've just grown up

Quote.Author: Cat Deeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't even own my own name on the internet - somebody else bought it

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is hard and it gets worse and worse and worse

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody tends to think I'm crazy, which is the biggest problem in my life

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: I got more guts than brains, and that's my problem

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a professional entertainer. I'm not Neil Diamond

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never had a clique. It's impossible when you're always traveling

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always dressed like a dude

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: I am human and I make mistakes

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: I moved to Los Angeles to be with a man I loved

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: I need to be able to face things

Quote.Author: Cat Power
Quote.QuoteValue: People and their religions don't affect me

Quote.Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: I get irritated, nervous, very tense or stressed, but never bored

Quote.Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: People who know me know I'm strong, but I'm vulnerable

Quote.Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is suffering. One side always loves more

Quote.Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: In America you need a bodyguard to go out

Quote.Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: I live very normally, I go out with my friends, we go to the movies, I queue, we go to restaurants

Quote.Author: Catherine Deneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: I like being famous when it's convenient for me and completely anonymous when it's not
